diagram:
@startuml
actor Librarian
actor Borrower
rectangle LibraryManagementSystem {
    usecase "Register Book" as UC1
    usecase "Borrow Book" as UC2
    usecase "Return Book" as UC3
    usecase "Search Catalog" as UC4
    usecase "Manage Borrower Accounts" as UC5
    usecase "Generate Reports" as UC6
}
Librarian --> UC1
Librarian --> UC2
Librarian --> UC3
Librarian --> UC5
Librarian --> UC6
Borrower --> UC2
Borrower --> UC3
Borrower --> UC4
UC2 .> UC3 : <<include>>
UC5 .> UC2 : <<include>>
UC6 .> UC4 : <<include>>
@enduml
raw_diagram:
@startuml
actor Librarian
actor Borrower

rectangle LibraryManagementSystem {
    usecase "Register Book" as UC1
    usecase "Borrow Book" as UC2
    usecase "Return Book" as UC3
    usecase "Search Catalog" as UC4
    usecase "Manage Borrower Accounts" as UC5
    usecase "Generate Reports" as UC6
}

Librarian --> UC1
Librarian --> UC2
Librarian --> UC3
Librarian --> UC5
Librarian --> UC6
Borrower --> UC2
Borrower --> UC3
Borrower --> UC4

UC2 .> UC3 : <<include>>
UC5 .> UC2 : <<include>>
UC6 .> UC4 : <<include>>
@enduml
